title: Mixed Reality Driver Warning Systems with fNIRS
description: A preliminary study investigating the potential of mixed reality (MR) to enhance driver warning systems, examining attention-shifting methods and hazard perception using functional near-infrared spectroscopy (fNIRS).

title: DrivingVibe: VR Driving Experience Enhancement
description: A vibrotactile feedback system using a 360-degree headband to enhance VR driving motion experiences through mirroring and 3D inertia-based approaches.

title: Alice in Gravityland: Gravity Experiences in VR
description: A VR adventure exploring three gravity experiences with novel around-the-head vibrotactile feedback using illusory tactile motion.

title: InertiaVibe: Cybersickness Reduction
description: A low-fidelity approach to simulate lateral inertial forces using headset-integrated vibration motors to reduce cybersickness and enhance VR experience.

title: VR Familiar Tourism Experience
description: An empirical study exploring VR's relevance in visiting familiar places using Google Earth VR, investigating the experience framework and empirical features.
